repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary:
Tamil version of the Vikramacarita, that is, 32 stories (Tamil katai) about the king Vikrama (Vikkiramātittaṉ) told to king Bhoja by the figurines (Tamil patumai) of his throne.

Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2020).

Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

filiation.p: GOML R. 1972, R. 2244. UVSL, vol. 4, pp. 246-7, No. 2040. TMSSML, vol. 1 , 1925, Nos. 579 and 589.

extent.measure: I.e. extent of main textual unit (U1).

collation.desc: the <emph rend="bold">front cover</emph>. Element of library binding.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">front guard folio</emph>. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Marbled paper on recto. Element of library binding.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">front guard folio</emph>. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.

1 folio = <emph rend="bold">front guard folio</emph>. Arabic black ink library foliation 1 on bottom right edge & Arabic pencil foliation 1 on bottom right edge. Shelfmark, title and stamp on the recto.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">front guard folio</emph>. Arabic pencil foliation 2 on bottom right edge. Catalogue reference on the recto. Old paper (original book).

44 folios = <emph rend="bold">text</emph>. Tamil black ink pagination {1}, 2-89 (first page not explicitly paginated) on top right edge; Arabic black ink library foliation 1-46 on upper top right edge; Arabic pencil foliation 3-47 on bottom right edge.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">back guard folio</emph>. Arabic black ink library foliation 47 on upper top right edge. Title and stamp on the recto. Watermark.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">back guard folio</emph>. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">back guard folio</emph>. No pagination/foliation. Blank recto verso. Marbled paper on verso. Element of library binding.

additions.desc: Title printed in golden letters: <quote>VIKRAMARKEN KADAI TAMOUL</quote> (<locus facs="111">spine</locus>).
Shelfmark in black ink <quote>N°14</quote> and title <quote>Vicra marken kadey</quote> (<locus facs="7">f[1]r</locus>).

Small <locus facs="9">sheet of paper</locus>, inserted in the binding between u5 and U1, bearing in black ink the title <quote>Vikramarken Kadai Tamoul</quote>. Note for the binder indicating the title to be displayed on the spine.
Catalogue reference in black pencil: <quote>Catal. Imper. N° XIV</quote> (<locus facs="11">f[1]r</locus>).
Title in black ink: <quote>Vicramarcoum catta.</quote> (<locus facs="103">f[1]r</locus>).

binding.p: <material>Leather</material> cover, with title and heraldic lilies on the spine.

origin.origDate: 1729 at the latest. Dated to circa by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-) and to 1750 by Cabaton (1912).

acquisition.p: It appears to be the paper <ref target="https://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b105278700/f17">Vicramarquen Cadey</ref> and <ref target="https://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b105278700/f31">Vicramarken Kadey</ref> sent by the Jesuits of the Mission du Carnate in 1729 for the library of the king of France and mentioned in ancien lists (BnF NAF 5442, f5r and f9r).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. <title>Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens</title>. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See <ref target="http://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b10329763p/f78">p. 49, no. 421</ref>.

S.n. 1739. <title>Catalogus codicum manuscriptorum Bibliothecae regiae. Tomus primus. Pars prima, complectens codices manuscriptos orientales.</title> Paris: Typographia Regia. — See p. <ref target="https://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/bpt6k140995x/f437">434, no. XIV</ref>.

Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. <title> Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga</title>. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See <ref target="https://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b105375868/f207">f. 96r, no. <del>386</del> 421</ref>.
Zvelebil, Kamil Veith. 1997a. <title type="article">The Tamil Vikramaditya</title>. <title>JAOS</title> 117.2: 294-305.

encodingDesc.p: <emph rend="bold">General</emph> ― Unmarked length of <foreign>ō</foreign> and <foreign>ē</foreign> supplied. Unmarked <foreign>puḷḷi</foreign> supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. <emph rend="bold">In transliteration</emph> ― Unmarked elided overshort <foreign>u</foreign> supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. <emph rend="bold">Abbreviations</emph> ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: This catalogue entry has been redacted by Emmanuel FRANCIS (CNRS, CEIAS UMR 8564, EHESS/CNRS) for the research program <ref target="https://tst.hypotheses.org/88">Texts Surrounding Texts</ref> (TST, FRAL 2018, ANR/DFG). Version 1, December 2020.
Updated to TST encoding conventions by Emmanuel FRANCIS.

<pb facs="13" n="1"/> <seg function="title"><lb n="1"/>vikkiṟamātittaṉ patumaikkatai</seg>
<seg function="invocation"><seg function="incipit"><milestone n="1" unit="column"/> <lb n="1"/>vētamutalē viṉāyaka <lb n="2" break="no"/>ṉentaṉiṭa kātaluk <lb n="3" break="no"/>ku muṉ tōṉṟuṅ kaṇa <lb n="4" break="no"/>tiyē nītipuṉai vikki <lb n="5" break="no"/>ṟamāṟkaṉ pēril vē <lb n="6" break="no"/>ṇṭuṅ kataiy uraikka <lb n="7"/>yikkataikku nīyē tu <lb n="8" break="no"/>ṇai</seg> –</seg> <seg function="completion-statement">viṉāyakaṉ tō <lb n="9" break="no"/>ttiramuṟṟum</seg> + – – <lb n="10" break="no"/>vikkiṟāmāṟkaṉ ka – <lb n="11" break="no"/>taiyāka pōcarāca <lb n="12" break="no"/>ṉ ciṅkātāṉatti – <lb n="13" break="no"/>le Eṟa vanta pōtu <lb n="14"/>patumaikaḷ coṉṉa katai – <gap reason="ellipsis"/>
<pb facs="24" n="12"/> <seg function="intertitle"><lb n="21-22"/>mutal-k katai</seg>
<pb facs="26" n="14"/> <seg function="intertitle"><lb n="4-5"/>y<pc>-</pc>iraṇṭāṅ katai</seg>
<pb n="88"/> <milestone n="2" unit="column"/> <lb n="27"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/> – pirā <lb n="28" break="no"/>maṇatti piḷḷai vārucikṣa <lb n="29" break="no"/>ttiriyap peṇṇiṉ piḷḷai <lb n="30"/>vikkiṟamāṟkaṉ vayici <lb n="31" break="no"/>yap peṇṇiṉ piḷḷai <lb n="32"/>paṭṭi <seg function="explicit">cūttirap peṇ <pb n="89"/> <milestone n="1" unit="column"/> <lb n="1" break="no"/>niṉ piḷḷai pattira <lb n="2" break="no"/>karipiḷḷaikaḷukk<pc>’</pc> e <lb n="3" break="no"/>llāmūttavaṉ patti <lb n="4" break="no"/> rakiri +</seg> <seg function="completion-statement">muṟṟum ++</seg> </ab> </body>
